hooks.command: FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -z "$FILE" ]; then exit 0; fi; WEBDIR="${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR}/apps/web"; if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$'; then cd "$WEBDIR" && npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; exit 0; fi; if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(json|css|md|html)$'; then cd "$WEBDIR" && npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; exit 0; fi
